description.en:
Yoko Minamino, also known as Yang who is obsessed with baseball. She is an adorable elementary school girl, but in reality she is a genius pitcher who throws razor shots at fastballs. He strikes out not just boys, but adults as well. She has formed a strong women's team, but in anticipation of her strength, she will not turn down requests for her helpers. A powerful rival who appeared there, Slugger Ryuzaki Arashi. The boys also catch the fastball of Yo-chan who dances sharply. The story of studying baseball in the United States comes to such two people. "Let's go together," Arashi encourages. However, in front of his classmate Terao-kun, for some reason, Yo-chan gives an answer.
<Robot Heiji>
A robot, Heiji, and a beautiful girl, Oshizuka, form a duo at the Minamimachi Police Station. Heiji, dressed in kimono, is throwing a 500-yen coin instead of a one-mon coin. Aikido 1st Dan Shizu-chan wears a police uniform. He confronts the crimes of killing, setting fire, and stealing within his jurisdiction with gags and laughter.
